title: IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Roorkee has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2025 , as mentioned below...
